original_text: If the whole body was an eye, the body would not hear anything. If the whole body was an ear, it would not recognize different smells.
korean_text: 만일 온 몸이 눈이면 듣는 곳은 어디며 온 몸이 듣는 곳이면 냄새 맡는 곳은 어디냐

sentences.original_text: If the whole body was an eye
the body would not hear anything
If the whole body was an ear
it would not recognize different smells
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 다른 냄새를 알아차리지 못할 것입니다
